citation: Proclamation under the Public Sector Superannuation Reform (Consequential and Transitional Provisions) Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Public Sector Superannuation Reform (Consequential and Transitional Provisions) Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Public Sector Superannuation Reform (Consequential and Transitional Provisions) Act 2016 , fix 31 March 2017 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

21 March 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 March 2017

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
